explanation: [0-0] A man in a green shirt and green hat is sitting on a brown bench, holding the hand of a woman in a pink dress and crown. There is a brown house behind them.
[0-2] Then the scene changes, a man in red clothes and a red hat is standing at a white window, speaking angrily with his mouth open.
